events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but want to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to product sizing.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello! I'm Sarah, here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn?
My order number is 789456123. I tried the jacket on once, but it has not been damaged or washed.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund process if you return the jacket in its original packaging.
That sounds good. Please let me know how to send it back and when I will receive the refund.
We've emailed the return instructions to you. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you've received the refund after returning the jacket as per instructions.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thank you for your quick and helpful support!
Closing this case as the refund process is complete and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
